title: Instructional Design and Utilization Strategies for OER-Based Science Education Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A science education competency enhancement program for professionals (medical, legal, technical) utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER).

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of OER and its educational potential.
Learners can develop discipline-specific OER evaluation rubrics through literature analysis.
Learners can derive a science domain-customized OER-integrated instructional design model.
Learners can implement OER-based educational scenarios through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
